name: Dark Space Legends - Space Shooter
description:
Dark Space Legends is the space shooter you are looking for with futuristic design and attractive environments. It will surely keep you entertained with its stunning game play, instant power-ups unlocking and extremely fiercer enemies.

In the year unknown your galaxy is overrun with the cybernetic alien empire whose swarms of ships would not stop until it had consumed each planet of your galaxy.

The enemy ships are moving through space bridges to send their massive army towards us.

Captain, you are our only hope for the survival of all the planets in the galaxy. So make us proud by annihilating the enemy forces.

Dark Space Legends: Space Shooter puts you into a galaxy full of cybernetic aliens who are determined to take over your galaxies planets. You have to face an ever-rising horde of enemies with extremely massive bosses in this space warfare.

As you progress in-game, you will earn Thorium coins which will help you to upgrade your spaceship to full of destructive capabilities.

Features:
* 8 Stunning Game Levels.
* Intense Boss Battles.
* Upgrade Your Spacecraft with Guns, Cannons, Missiles, Shields & Plasma Bombs.
* Awesome Sci-Fi Soundtrack.
* Play Offline.

Download Now & Save the Galaxy.
